features: 72H UNCOMPROMISING PROTECTION: Dove Men+Care Extra Fresh Antiperspirant deodorant’s revolutionary formula gives you powerful 72-hour sweat and odor protection while moisturizing your skin.
NON-IRRITANT FORMULA: Designed with ¼ moisturizer, our antiperspirant deodorant helps retain skin moisture and protect against irritation for more comfortable underarms.
LONG LASTING FRAGRANCE: Dove Men+Care Extra Fresh Antiperspirant Deodorant features a reinvigorating, long-lasting citrus scent to keep you feeling fresh all day.
1/4 MOISTURIZING CREAM: Dove Men+Care antiperspirant uses our exclusive care for comfortable underarms all day.
HOW TO USE: Apply this antiperspirant deodorant stick evenly on your underarms for comfortable underarms and all-day confidence.
body.description: Looking for an antiperspirant deodorant for men that’s designed to keep you feeling fresh and confident? Try Dove Men+Care Extra Fresh Antiperspirant Deodorant Stick. Our Extra Fresh antiperspirant deodorant provides powerful 72-hour protection against sweat and odor for lasting freshness. This antiperspirant for men is formulated with our ¼ moisturizing cream to deliver skin moisturization and helps protect against skin irritation. Dove Men+Care Extra Fresh Antiperspirant Deodorant features a long lasting energizing citrus scent to invigorate your senses and leave you feeling fresh all day. Simply apply Dove Men+Care Extra Fresh Antiperspirant Deodorant in evenly onto each of your underarms for best results. You now have the powerful protection you need. All Dove products are cruelty-free, following Dove's global commitment not to test on animals. Looking for more Dove Men+Care skin care products? Try the full range of Dove Men+Care products, including deodorants, antiperspirants, dry spray antiperspirant deodorants, body washes, face and body bars, and hair care products.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Powerful 72H Protection Your day can get busy and stressful; smelling bad or feeling uncomfortable shouldn't be an added worry for you. New Dove Men+Care gives you better, complete protection, so you can have peace of mind all day. Care For Your Skin No matter which deodorant you choose, your underarms will get the additional care of the 1/4 moisturizing cream that you can only get from Dove Men+Care. Clinically proven care that doesn't irritate the skin, leaving it softer and more comfortable. All-day Confidence Smelling fresh goes a long way to feeling cool, calm, and in control. The long-lasting scent will give you the increased confidence you need to be your best all day, no matter what role you're playing. Care For The Planet This Dove Men+Care deodorant is formulated without aluminum. Dove has been globally accredited "Cruelty-Free" by the animal rights organization PETA (People for the Ethical Treatment of Animals).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Experience Unmatched Freshness with Dove Men+Care 72-Hour Antiperspirant
reviews.reviewText: In a world where keeping fresh on the go is paramount, Dove Men+Care Antiperspirant has indeed come through as a stalwart companion. Having explored numerous antiperspirants, my quest for that perfect blend of durability and ease of use seemed endless, until the encounter with this Dove marvel. From the first glide, it was apparent, this was no ordinary contender.The hassle-free application process is a testament to its user-centric design, making each morning's prep a breeze. When it promises 72-hour sweat and odor protection, it's not mere words but a lived reality, even through my hectic daily hustles. This product doesn't just mask but tackles odor at the core, while its Triple Action Moisturizer coupled with Vitamin E, leaves my underarm skin feeling nurtured and smooth, a far cry from the irritation experienced with some other brands.The pack of four is not only a bang for the buck but a wise investment towards a hassle-free, fresh lifestyle. It's been a loyal companion for over six months now, and the cans are still going strong, a true testament to its durability. In a market saturated with fleeting gimmicks, Dove Men+Care stands head and shoulders above, not just as a product but as a lifestyle companion. The ease, the effectiveness, and the enduring freshness, are what sets it apart from the fleeting satisfaction offered by others in its league.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Effective and Pleasantly Scented - Great for Everyday Use
reviews.reviewText: Review Title: "Effective and Pleasantly Scented - Great for Everyday Use"Review:DOVE MEN + CARE Antiperspirant Deodorant has quickly become my go-to deodorant, standing out as one of the best in the market. Its scent is a significant plus - subtle, almost neutral, yet very pleasant, making it suitable for everyday use without being overpowering.In terms of its antiperspirant capabilities, it performs exceptionally well for the average person who deals with regular sweating. It offers reliable protection for one day, keeping you feeling fresh and confident throughout the day.However, for those dealing with more severe sweating issues, like hyperhidrosis, this deodorant might not be entirely sufficient. It's a great starting point and worth a try, but if you have a medical condition causing excessive sweating, you might need to explore options that are specifically designed for more intense needs, possibly on the medical-grade side.All in all, for the everyday user looking for effective sweat protection and a neutral, pleasant scent, DOVE MEN + CARE is an excellent choice.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Dove Men+Care Extra Fresh: 12 Years of Freshness, Loved by Both of Us
reviews.reviewText: No, I Won't Share a Photo Wearing It – That Would Be Weird! 🤣 Dove Men+Care Extra Fresh Antiperspirant Deodorant Stick has been a constant in my routine for an impressive 12 years now, and it has become a staple for both me and my wife. The longevity and freshness it delivers go beyond mere protection – it's a scent that my wife absolutely loves.The 72-hour protection ensures I stay confidently fresh throughout the day, and the energizing citrus scent has become a signature aroma that my wife finds incredibly appealing. It's more than just a deodorant; it's a fragrance that lingers, creating a positive and lasting impression.What sets this deodorant apart is not only its commitment to freshness but also to skincare. Formulated with ¼ moisturizing cream, it not only guards against sweat and odor but also ensures my skin stays moisturized, making it a win-win for me.The ease of application and even coverage make it a hassle-free addition to my daily routine, and the fact that Dove Men+Care Extra Fresh Antiperspirant Deodorant is cruelty-free aligns with our values as a family.In essence, this deodorant has become more than just a product; it's a shared experience of freshness and a fragrance that resonates positively in our daily lives. Here's to another 12 years of confidently staying fresh and keeping the scent my wife loves with Dove Men+Care Extra Fresh Antiperspirant Deodorant Stick.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Scent is nice and lasts long, amazing

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars 72 Hours of Confidence!
reviews.reviewText: Dove Men + Care Antiperspirant Deodorant has truly exceeded my expectations, and the 72-hour anti-stain protection is a game-changer! This Pack of 4 is an excellent value that ensures that my husband stays fresh and confident for an extended period.The invisible deodorant formula lives up to its promise. No more worrying about unsightly stains on his shirts – this deodorant goes on clear and stays that way, providing reliable protection without the mess. It's a relief to have a product that not only keeps him dry but also keeps his clothes looking new.The fresh and subtle scent is perfect – not too overpowering, yet effective in keeping him feeling clean throughout the day. The long-lasting formula means he can apply it in the morning and trust that it will provide protection well into the evening.The 2.7-ounce size is just right for everyday use, and the pack of 4 ensures I always have a backup on hand. The compact design is travel-friendly, making it easy to stay fresh and confident on the go.I appreciate Dove Men+Care's commitment to quality, and this antiperspirant deodorant has become my go-to choice for my husband. It's gentle on his skin, dries quickly, and doesn't leave a sticky residue. It's the complete package when it comes to effective, long-lasting, and stain-free protection.In conclusion, if you're looking for a reliable antiperspirant deodorant that goes above and beyond, Dove Men + Care is the way to go. The 72-hour anti-stain protection has made a significant difference in his daily routine, and I highly recommend it to other men seeking a high-quality deodorant for all-day confidence!
Reached on time and good product
I like the smell and it doesn’t leave sticky feeling when apply
